protein.specific_function: Binds to disheveled (Dvl) and Rho, and mediates Wnt- induced Dvl-Rho complex formation. May play a role as a scaffolding protein to recruit Rho-GDP and Rho-GEF, thereby enhancing Rho-GTP formation. Can direct nucleation and elongation of new actin filaments

go_class.description: cellular component organization at cellular level
